body_html:
@jart
I've update my comment.

the problem is that:

/data_tmp/train1Z.tfrecord
/data_tmp/traintY.tfrecord

are the files that I used in training section. They were saved as const in trained model(ckpt.meta). When I inference the model use import_meta_graph(), it seems that it would insure these 'old files' exist.

body:
@jart 
I've update my comment.

the problem is that:
```
/data_tmp/train1Z.tfrecord
/data_tmp/traintY.tfrecord
```
are the files that I used in training section. They were saved as const in trained model(ckpt.meta). When I inference the model use import_meta_graph(),  it seems that it would insure these 'old files' exist.
